data.title: Movies About Movies — HEADSTONE GALLERY
data.meta_description: Robert Altman’s The Player  presented by Kingston Film Foundation.  Free event open to the public. Popcorn and beverages available for purchase, complimentary hot tea.
data.text:
Robert Altman’s The Player presented by Kingston Film Foundation

The Player is a 1992 American satirical black comedy mystery film directed by Robert Altman and written by Michael Tolkin, based on his own 1988 novel of the same name. The film stars Tim Robbins, Greta Scacchi, Fred Ward, Whoopi Goldberg, Peter Gallagher, Brion James and Cynthia Stevenson.

Free event open to the public. Popcorn and beverages available for purchase, complimentary hot tea.
